solution_line_template: The cafeteria used {num_lasagnas} lasagnas * {mince_per_lasagna} pounds of ground mince = <<{num_lasagnas}*{mince_per_lasagna}={mince_for_lasagnas}>>{mince_for_lasagnas} pounds of ground mince for the lasagnas.

This means they used {total_mince_used} pounds of ground mince in total - {mince_for_lasagnas} pounds of ground mince for the lasagnas = {mince_for_cottage_pies} pounds of ground mince for the cottage pies.

So they must have made {mince_for_cottage_pies} pounds of ground mince for the cottage pies / {mince_per_cottage_pie} pounds of ground mince per cottage pie = <<{mince_for_cottage_pies}/{mince_per_cottage_pie}={num_cottage_pies}>>{num_cottage_pies} cottage pies.
